item.title: Flow-DPO: Improving LLM Mathematical Reasoning through Online Multi-Agent Learning
item.description: Flow-DPO improves LLM mathematical reasoning by using online multi-agent learning and direct preference optimization to generate high-quality reasoning traces, surpassing existing methods in performan…

item.title: Precise and Dexterous Robotic Manipulation via Human-in-the-Loop Reinforcement Learning
item.description: Human-in-the-loop RL system achieves near-perfect success rates on diverse dexterous robotic manipulation tasks within just 1-2.5 hours of real-world training, outperforming prior methods.

item.title: Robots Pre-train Robots: Manipulation-Centric Robotic Representation from Large-Scale Robot Dataset
item.description: MCR, a novel pre-training method, learns manipulation-centric robotic representations from large-scale robot datasets, significantly boosting real-world robot manipulation success rates.

item.title: ShadowKV: KV Cache in Shadows for High-Throughput Long-Context LLM Inference
item.description: SHADOWKV boosts long-context LLM inference throughput by up to 3x and supports 6x larger batch sizes using a novel low-rank key cache and value cache offloading strategy.

item.title: AutoKaggle: A Multi-Agent Framework for Autonomous Data Science Competitions
item.description: AutoKaggle: a multi-agent framework automates data science competitions, achieving 85% validation submission and 82% comprehensive score on 8 Kaggle tasks.
